cold_snaps.status: There is currently no cold snap.  This year there have been 6 cold snaps, usually there are 3.7 cold snaps per year.

extreme.status: The record temperature difference stands at 26.7°C (0.4 - 27.1°C), set on 29 April 2025.

heatwave.status: At the moment, it is not a heatwave.  This year has seen 6 heatwaves; typically, 1.9 heatwaves happen every year.

heaviest_rainfall.status: On 04 January 2025, a record rainfall of 36.8mm was measured, indicating an exceptionally wet day.  4.6mm per hour was recorded as falling at times during the 37.2 hour storm.

heaviest_rainrate.status: The rain rate reached 16.6mm per hour during the storm today (ranking 2nd from our records) and resulted in 5.69mm of total rain in 3.2 hours.  The heaviest rain was recorded on 02 September 2025 with a peak rate of 27.0mm per hour.  The storm lasted 15.0 hours and had a total rainfall of 21.19mm.

storm.status: On 04 January 2025, the rain lasted for 37.2 hours, which is the longest time recorded by our database.  36.8mm accumulated and it fell at 4.6mm per hour at times.
There is a storm in the vicinity.  This is the first storm since 03 September 2025.

top_10_dry.status: The longest dry period started on 24 April 2025 and lasted for 19 days.

top_10_rainy.status: This period, starting 26 August 2025, is ranked 4th among the longest rainy periods since August 2024.  It has lasted 10 days so far.  The longest rainy period started on 30 November 2024 and lasted for 10 days.

top_10_windy.status: The longest windy period started on 11 October 2012 and lasted for 21 days.

tropical: The previous tropical night was on 18 July 2025, with only 62 in total since 1973.

average.status: The current wind direction is southerly (191°), which is about average.  In the UK, a southerly wind usually brings milder, moist air from the Atlantic.

gusts.status: The largest wind gust ever was on 13 October 2012 with a value of 93.7 mph.

run.status: The largest wind run ever was on 21 October 2012 with a value of 1754 miles.  The long-term average wind run is 229.41 miles and so far today the wind run is 65.98 miles.

speed.status: To date, the maximum wind speed recorded was 93.7 mph on 13 October 2012.

summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.9°C) and outside temperature (down 3.1°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 7 mbar), light levels (up 7022 lux), rainfall (up 0.8 mm), and cloud levels (up 116 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 10452 lux), cloud levels (up 1586 m), and rainfall (down 0.4 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 115.5m lower than yesterday, 473.4m lower than the past week, 1586.0m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 565m to 1838m and averaged 995.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok and winds will be practically absent. Rain showers likely, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather could become unsettled.
